overview: Artistic, edgy XXX storyteller John Stagliano presents "Intercourse With A Vampire," a compilation of intense action from the director's cinematic porn serial "Voracious." Shot in Europe and California, this Gothic erotica delivers eerie supernatural lore and strikingly kinky hardcore sex. Lithe European beauty Cayenne Klein plays a vampire in need of human sperm. Trussed up in chains, she seduces Markus Dupree and Thomas Stone for a threesome of blowjobs and rim jobs, pussy squirting, double penetration and ass gaping. Subterranean creatures of the night assist a priest attempting to bring undead Amira (Brooklyn Lee) back to human life.
title: Intercourse with a Vampire
